title: Air & Darkness (Andras' MoonRiver Series) Book One
description: Andras' MoonRiver's whole world has just been spun on its head; She has been ripped away from everything that she has ever known and thrown into a whole new world; Taking a job to hunt down a goul; turns into a journey of a lifetime. Discovering there is more to everything, including her self. She must relying on some unlikely characters that led her to worlds she has never before seen. She has to focus on the power she holds within; if she has any hope of saving the worlds she loves
author: Angela Laycock
